Hi all, I'm wondering if there's a way to change the default plotting options at the beginning of a section? I have a lot of plots with repeated options, like the following:

plot(10 .^(LinRange(-2,1,100)), x -> exp(x), color = :black, lw=2,
        xlabel = "x", 
        ylabel = L"$\exp\ (x)$", 
        xaxis = :log10, 
        yaxis = :log10, 
        legend = false, 
        size = (400,400), 
        framestyle=:box, 
        xticks=([0.01, 0.1, 1, 10, 100], [0.01, 0.1, 1, 10, 100]), 
        minorticks=10,
        tickfont = font(12, "serif-roman"), 
        fontfamily = "serif-roman", 
        guidefontsize = 14, 
        grid=false)

Setting default values for 'size', 'fontfamily', 'grid', 'legend', 'framestyle', etc., at the start of a Jupyter notebook would be quite useful. Thanks!
